Reviews.Title: Have owned for 3 years...still running great.
Reviews.Author: disciple75
Reviews.Content: I think the previous comment was by a guy who bought a damaged model. Mine has worked just fine for over three years. The quality is pretty darn good for the price and the thing weighs next to nothing. I bring it with me all the time when going over to a friend's house for some video game time. It feels like it weighs only 15 pounds and is plenty durable.

Reviews.Title: Owned since 2006
Reviews.Author: Cody55
Reviews.Content: I've owned this TV since September 2006 and it has been a great TV. It's not HD but the picture is very good. This TV is very light weight and easily portable if needed.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: Julie Macdowall "MacJule"
Reviews.Content: Don't waste your money on this TV.  We have had one for less than a year,and now it turns on, plays for 5 secs, and turns off.  If you google this model, you will find multiple hits describing the same problem. I have not found a fix yet.

ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in MTS/SAP Tuner
S-video input
Component Video input
Audio input x2
181 Channel PLL Tuner
ProductInfo.Name: Symphonic 20" LCD TV with Remote Control, WF20L6
